snippet: Last year's Super Bowl is best remembered for a team's unsuccessful decision to throw on what appeared to be an obvious running down near the goal line, the sort of thing that maybe shouldn't surprise anyone, given the emphasis on passing in today...
lead_paragraph: Last year's Super Bowl is best remembered for a team's unsuccessful decision to throw on what appeared to be an obvious running down near the goal line, the sort of thing that maybe shouldn't surprise anyone, given the emphasis on passing in today's NFL.

headline.main: From Riggins to Allen to Elway, the Best Super Bowl Runs
headline.print_headline: From Riggins to Allen to Elway, the Best Super Bowl Runs
